whatIsKoya.question: What is Koya?
whatIsKoya.answer: Koya is an AI-powered receptionist that answers your business calls 24/7. It can handle inquiries, book appointments, take messages, and transfer calls - all automatically. Koya learns about your business through the knowledge base you create and responds naturally to callers.

howToStart.question: How do I get started with Koya?
howToStart.answer:
Getting started is easy:

1. Complete your business profile in the Knowledge Base
2. Add your services and FAQs
3. Configure your voice and call handling preferences in Settings
4. Get your Koya phone number or forward your existing line
5. Make a test call to hear Koya in action!

The setup typically takes less than 10 minutes.

phoneNumber.question: How do I get a phone number for Koya?
phoneNumber.answer: You can either get a new local phone number from Koya or forward your existing business line. To get a new number, go to Settings > Phone & Billing. To forward an existing number, contact your phone provider and set up call forwarding to your Koya number.

testCall.question: How do I test Koya?
testCall.answer: You can make a test call anytime by calling your Koya phone number directly, or use the 'Test Call' button on your dashboard. Test calls help you hear how Koya responds and make sure everything is configured correctly.

voiceSettings.question: How do I change Koya's voice?
voiceSettings.answer: Go to Settings > Voice & Personality. You can choose from different voice options (male or female), adjust the speaking speed, expressiveness, and volume. You can also customize the greeting message and set a personality style (professional, friendly, or casual).

knowledgeBase.question: What should I add to my Knowledge Base?
knowledgeBase.answer:
Your Knowledge Base helps Koya understand your business. Include:

- Business name, address, and hours
- Services you offer with descriptions and pricing
- Frequently asked questions and answers
- Any special policies or instructions
- Things Koya should NOT say

The more detailed your knowledge base, the better Koya can help your callers.

callHandling.question: How does call handling work?
callHandling.answer:
Koya answers calls based on your settings. You can configure:

- When to transfer calls to a human
- After-hours behavior
- Maximum call duration
- Call recording preferences
- Custom transfer keywords

Koya can take messages, provide information, or book appointments depending on what the caller needs.

notifications.question: What notifications can I receive?
notifications.answer:
You can receive notifications via SMS and email for:

- All incoming calls
- New appointment bookings
- Missed calls
- Messages taken
- Usage alerts

You can also enable daily or weekly summary emails. Go to Settings > Notifications to customize your preferences.

spanishSupport.question: Does Koya support Spanish?
spanishSupport.answer: Yes! Koya can communicate in both English and Spanish. Go to Settings > Language to enable Spanish support. You can choose to have Koya auto-detect the caller's language, ask first, or default to Spanish. Make sure to add Spanish greetings in your voice settings.

calendarIntegration.question: How do I connect my calendar?
calendarIntegration.answer:
Go to Settings > Calendar to connect Google Calendar or Outlook. Once connected, Koya will:

- Check your availability before booking
- Add new appointments to your calendar
- Sync cancellations and changes

You can also use Koya's built-in calendar if you prefer not to connect an external one.

googleCalendar.question: Why isn't Google Calendar syncing?
googleCalendar.answer:
If your Google Calendar isn't syncing:

1. Go to Settings > Calendar
2. Disconnect and reconnect your Google account
3. Make sure you granted calendar permissions
4. Check that you selected the correct calendar

If issues persist, try signing out of Google and signing back in.

smsNotifications.question: How do SMS notifications work?
smsNotifications.answer: Koya sends SMS notifications to your phone number (and optionally to customers). For you, this includes call alerts and booking notifications. For customers, Koya can send booking confirmations and appointment reminders. Go to Settings > SMS Templates to customize the message content.

callsNotWorking.question: Koya isn't answering calls - what should I do?
callsNotWorking.answer:
If Koya isn't answering calls:

1. Check that your phone number is active in Settings > Phone & Billing
2. Verify you have minutes remaining in your plan
3. Make sure call forwarding is set up correctly (if using your own number)
4. Try making a test call from a different phone

If issues continue, contact support for help.

appointmentsNotSyncing.question: Appointments aren't appearing in my calendar
appointmentsNotSyncing.answer:
If appointments aren't syncing:

1. Check your calendar connection in Settings > Calendar
2. Verify the correct calendar is selected
3. Look for the appointment in the Appointments tab
4. Try disconnecting and reconnecting your calendar

Note: It may take a few minutes for new appointments to appear in external calendars.

voiceQuality.question: The voice quality sounds poor - how can I fix it?
voiceQuality.answer:
To improve voice quality:

1. Go to Settings > Call Features
2. Enable background noise reduction
3. Adjust the responsiveness settings
4. Try a different voice option in Voice & Personality

Voice quality can also be affected by the caller's phone connection.

tooltips.voicemailDetection: Koya will detect voicemail and leave a message instead of trying to have a conversation.

hero.subtitle: Your AI receptionist answers calls 24/7, books appointments, and handles inquiries—so you can focus on what matters most.

howItWorks.sectionSubtitle: Get up and running in minutes, not weeks. No technical skills required.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Sign up and customize Koya with your services, hours, FAQs, and booking preferences.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose a new local number or forward your existing line. Koya starts answering immediately.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Koya answers calls 24/7, books appointments, and sends SMS confirmations automatically.
howItWorks.readyText: Ready to never miss a call again?
